recipesJson.name: Nutty Monkey Custard
recipesJson.author: Wafflepriest1
recipesJson.description: Peanut Butter and Banana Custard. I've worked on this recipe for months and finally feel ready to release it, so here goes! The inhale is where the banana really shines, sitting in a smooth, thick, and simple custard. Definitely heavier than a banana pudding. On the exhale, the banana sticks around for a bit and then gets taken over by the peanut butter flavor - a slightly sticky but all natural tasting PB. TPA PB is used to get the texture, but to me the flavor is just redskin peanuts - and a PB made of peanut skin is nasty AF. So Hangsen is used at low percents to provide a natural, peanut (no skin) taste that covers up the flavor from TPA. Alright guys, that's it! Please let me know what you think in the comments, I can take the heat if you think it's complete shit. ;)

reviews.text: Finding it hard to put this stuff down. I mixed it 1-1 but i cant help to think cheeba ls suggestion of hs banana would prolly be wonderful. As is it is a very smooth vape. The combo of tfa pb hs and vcv1 is one id prolly go back to when going for a pb flavor. I love recipes that are multi dimensional. I get the banana on the inhale and more and more pb throughout the exhale.. great job

This is the best I have ever tried, The banana sits perfect at the bottom of this vape and doesn't encompass the vape which most banana  mixes do and I hate. The peanut butter mix is perfect as well. Definitely a smooth thick feeling but not robust at all. 30 ml bottle was gone in 1 day. Mix this up guys, you won't regret it.
